parameters.message: "Okay, why not. But we should change your shirt."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Oh... This?"
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: He removes his shirt.
"Solved!"
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: His chest is awesome. Wish I had the discipline to build a body like that.
"So, I need to eat something. You know what they say about drinking on an empty stomach!"
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: "But... Okay, you just puked, so your stomach must be empty. I don't know if that's how it works, but okay."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Let's go already!"
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: We leave my room and go towards the kitchen.
Keisuke trips along the way, but we eventually arrive.
"Okay, so what should I cook for you?"
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Oh, no no no, I will cook for US!"
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: I won't be eating his food.
"I'm not hungry, really..."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "I'll cook for myself then!"
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: "And what will you cook?"
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "The only thing I know! JUNK FOOD!"
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: "What do you need?"
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Hmmmmm let me see... Scotch! Pound ground meat, some pepper, egg, some bread... Oil... uhm... pepper and..."
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: "You said pepper already."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Oh... Sorry... Uhm... Oh man, I don't know, get that and if I need anything else, I'll improvise. C'mon! Let's do this!"
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: He starts pre-heating the grill while I grab the ingredients he wanted. It seems he's going for a classic burger.
"Hey man, get me some shrooms as well!"
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: "Okay!"
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: I come back with the ingredients, and he starts mixing everything as it should.
As he starts form the patties, I notice he is making four burgers.
"I'm not eating, remember?"
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Oh shoot! I forgot. Well, I can eat four, no problem!"
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: His burgers are coming up quite pretty, I might as well eat one.
"Time to fire it up!"
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: He starts grilling the burgers. They smell fine. Not great, but I mean, it's very hard to fuck up a burger.
Unless you overcook it or...
"Blaaargh..."
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: "What? I was not looking! What happened?"
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Cof... cof... oh, nothing, everything is fine."
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: Did he... puked on the grill?
"Okay, ready for consumption! You sure you don't want one?"
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: "Yup." - I was considering eating one, until that 'blaargh'.
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Your loss!"
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: He starts eating savagely.
The first burger is gone.
The second one as well.
The third one.. oh wat?
He starts running towards the door with a burger on his hand.
"Gosh... I'll be right back."
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: Maybe he went to puke? Hope he finds his way to the bathroom this time...
Anyway, let me take a look at his burguer.
Hm.
Wonder if Keisuke cooked the Lasagna...
Maybe if I... Test his burger with my dick...
